p: siRNA targeting FFAR2 or scrambled siRNA at a concentration of 30 nM was transfected into A549 cells seeded into 12-well plates by using the Lipofectamine RNAiMAX transfection reagent. At 48 h posttransfection, the siRNA-treated A549 cells were infected with VSV-EGFP (100 50% tissue culture infective doses [TCID 50]). Supernatants were collected at the indicated time points and titrated on HEK293T cells by calculating the TCID 50.
